### 1
How does the happiness of a respondent relate to the marriage status?

```{r}
dat <- read_xls('../ds202_lab3/Data/GSS.xls')
ggplot(dat, aes(x = dat$`General happiness`, fill = dat$`Marital status`)) + geom_bar()
```
